name: rock-climb
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.
